content.rendered:
Klagenfurt Airport (KarntenAirport) in Klagenfurt, Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : Karntner Flughafen Betriebsgesellschaft mbH
Flughafenstrabe 60-64
A-9020 Klagenfurt am Worthersee

Phone : +43 (0) 463 41500 – 0

Email id: office@airport-klagenfurt.at

Hours: Monday to Sunday,
November 9th, 2020 to January 30th, 21: 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

Klagenfurt Airport (KarntenAirport) Official website: https://airport-klagenfurt.at/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: LOWK

ICAO code: KLU

List of Airports in Austria

Services / Facilities at Klagenfurt Airport (KarntenAirport)

  • Car, Bus & Train
  • Parking
  • Taxi
  • Rental Car
  • Meeting rooms
  • VIP handling
  • E-Vehicles charging
  • Business Jets
  • Sightseeing flights
  • Balloon rides
  • ATM
  • Cafe & Restaurant
  • Visitors Terrace
  • Lockers

AUSTRIAN Service Center – Klagenfurt Airport (KarntenAirport)

If you want to buy, rebook or cancel a flight ticket directly at the airport, please contact the Austrian Service Center.

Tel .:  Reachable on +43 (0) 517 66 1000

Hours: Monday to Sunday from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

Website: www.austrian.com

Car Rental contact – Klagenfurt Airport (KarntenAirport)

Europcar AustriaAvisBudgetBuchbinder-Rent-a-Car Megadrive Autovermietung GmbH Hertz / Thrifty / DollarSixt
Europcar Austria: Klagenfurt Airport station – +43 (0) 1 866 1690 or +43 (0) 664 825 8745
Email: klagenfurt-airport@europcar.at Website: www.europcar.at/kaerntenmobil, For International reservations – Email: international@europcar.at Website:  www.europcar.at Contact for corporate customers – Tel .: +43 (0) 1 866 16 1631
Email: sales@europcar.at Website: www.europcar.at/b2b
Avis: +43 (0) 463 55938, +43 (0) 463 504032 Website: www.avis.at Email: klagenfurt@avis.at
Budget: Car Rental Terminal – Avis Counter Phone: +43 (0) 463 55938 Fax: +43 (0) 463 504032 Website: National reservations – www.budget.at
Buchbinder-Rent-a-Car:   Phone: +43 (0) 507010 46900 Email: info.klagenfurt@buchbinder-rent-a-car.at
Website: www.buchbinder-rent-a-car.at 
Megadrive Autovermietung GmbH: +43 (0) 50 105 4140, International Reservations 24hr +43 (0) 50 105 4050 Email: office.ktn@autovermlassung.at Website: www.megadrive.at
Hertz / Thrifty / Dollar: +43 (0) 463 56147, International Reservations +43 (0) 800 201 111 Website: www.hertz.at
Sixt:  +43 (0) 463 420 640, +43 (0) 810 977 800, Fax: +43 (0) 463 420 639 Website: ap807@sixt.com
